      • isValidMove

        public Piece.Coords isValidMove(Board b,
                                int r,
                                int c,
                                int endR,
                                int endC)
        Description copied from class: Piece
        Finds whether or not the piece can move from one location to another location for a given board. Note castling returns (0, -1).
        Specified by:
        isValidMove in class Piece
        Parameters:
        b - board to check on
        r - starting row location
        c - starting column location
        endR - ending row location
        endC - ending column location
        Returns:
        null if invalid, otherwise the coordinates of the captured piece (or r, c = -1 if no piece was captured)
